pros:
Supportive atmosphere
Opportunity to move between responsibilities and roles
The organisation really believes in its mandate and improving the lives of others.
Real Christian ethos within the organisation.
cons: None that I can think of.

pros: Meaningful work and international environment; dedicated implementors of projects
cons: Three days in the office requirement, less work life balance and lot of overtime with no bonuses, very low retirement contribution

review_title: Great opportunity to learn, but be clear on our personal objectives
pros: Great team spirit. Really doing the extra mile for the beneficiaries. Very open to pro-active propositions.  Real possibilities in evolve within the organization (back office to field or from field to back office).
cons: Low salaries and no social advantages. Emergency is a constant in the culture of the organization. Lack of strategic consistency.

pros: Medair is a values based organisation, that puts their beneficiaries first.
cons: There are very few good managers at Medair. Staff development isn't taken seriously by leadership.

Few professional and financial incentives.
No career growth opportunities.
A lot of burnout among employees.
